Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I just visited the sourceforge download site and saw that there was a
precompiled windows version 1.7.1 available. 

However, I'd like to install the latest 'stable' version on a linux
machine. Is it possible to download a packaged version of the 1.7.1
source code or is 1.7.1 the current CVS version? (I remember an e-mail
announcing that 1.7.1 could be downloaded from CVS)

Regards,
-Ingmar Schoegl-

--=-BxHSshQPblA4rPfiUgJx

<BODY>
I just visited the sourceforge download site and saw that there was a precompiled windows version 1.7.1 available. <BR>
<BR>
However, I'd like to install the latest 'stable' version on a linux machine. Is it possible to download a packaged version of the 1.7.1 source code or is 1.7.1 the current CVS version? (I remember an e-mail announcing that 1.7.1 could be downloaded from CVS)<BR>
<BR>
Regards,<BR>
-Ingmar Schoegl-
</BODY>
</HTML>
